rowexpansiondatatable.description:
Row Expansion DataTable for YUI 2 Author: gelinase@yahoo-inc.com / Eric Gelinas
Modified by Daniel Barreiro (satyam@satyam.com.ar)
rowexpansiondatatable.title: RowExpansionDataTable Widget
rowexpansiondatatable.requires: yahoo, dom, event, element, datasource, datatable
rowexpansiondatatable.name: rowexpansiondatatable

YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable.name: YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable

params.name: aColumnDefs
params.description: Array of object literal Column definitions.

constructors.description:
The RowExpansionDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
functionality for expanding rows to show more contextual data.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange.name: beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange
beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange.description: Fires before the value for the configuration attribute 'rowExpansionTemplate' changes. Return false to cancel the attribute change.

rowExpansionDestroyEvent.description: Fires when a row is about to be deleted

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

rowExpansionTemplateChange.name: rowExpansionTemplateChange
rowExpansionTemplateChange.description: Fires when the value for the configuration attribute 'rowExpansionTemplate' changes.

rowCollapsedEvent.description: Fires when a row is collapsed

rowExpandedEvent.description: Fires when a row is expanded

restoreExpandedRows.description:
Restores rows which have been expanded state but the original markup
has been removed from the page.

getExpansionContainer.description: returns the container element for the expansion

params.name: row
params.description:
DOM element reference or ID string
to DataTable page element or RecordSet index.

params.name: count
params.description:
(optional) How many rows to delete. A negative value
will delete towards the beginning.

deleteRows.description: This is an override for DataTable's own deleteRows to delete the expansion rows before the main rows are deleted

initializeTable.description: This is an override for DataTable's own initializeTable which it calls after it destroys all expansion rows

collapseRow.description: Sets the expansion state of a row to collapsed

toggleRowExpansion.description: Toggles the expansion state of a row

params.name: recordId
params.description: <HTMLElement | Number | String>    DOM reference to a TR element (or child of a TR element), RecordSet position index, or Record ID.

params.name: fn
params.description:
Reference to a function that will be called once for ever record.  
fn will receive a Record instance and the index for the record as its arguments.
fn may return false to break out of the loop.

params.name: scope
params.description: (optional) Scope to execute fn in.  It defaults to the DataTable instance.

forAllRecords.description: Loops through all Record instances in the RecordSet

params.name: row
params.description:
DOM element reference or ID string
to DataTable page element or RecordSet index.

deleteRow.description: This is an override for DataTable's own deleteRow to delete the expansion row before the main row is deleted

params.name: configuration
params.description: attributes taken from the fourth argument to the constructor

initAttributes.description: Over-ridden initAttributes method from DataTable, inherited from Element

onDataReturnSetRows.description: This is an override for DataTable's own onDataReturnSetRows which it calls after it destroys all expansion rows since with server-side pagination, with every new page it ignores the previous records

destroy.description: Overrides DataTable's destroy method to also destroy expansion rows.

params.name: value
params.description: Value to assign to the key

setExpansionState.description:
Sets a value to a expansion state object with a given Key for a record
which is associated with the DataTable

onEventToggleRowExpansion.description: Helper method which toggles row expansion.

expandRow.description: Sets the expansion state of a row to expanded

return.description:
State data object or value for Key. The full state object contains
  • record: reference to the associated Record instance
  • expanded: true when the row is expanded
  • expTrEl: the TR element for the expansion row
  • expLinerEl: the container for the expansion
  • other: Developers may store extra information in it

params.name: key
params.description:
(optional) Key to return within the state object. Default is to
return all as a map

getExpansionState.description:
Gets expansion state object for a specific record associated with the
DataTable.

rowExpansionTemplate.description: Template for the expansion row. If a String, it will be processed through YAHOO.lang.substitute and will have all the values in the associated Record available. If a Function, it will receive the expansion state object, see: getExpansionState

YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable.description:
The RowExpansionDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
functionality for expanding rows to show more contextual data.
